text:
If I wanted to install the default service on Windows ME with
'apache -k install', the following error message occured:
'Socket operation on non-socket: make_sock: for address 0.0.0.0:80, 
apr_socket_opt_set:
(SO_KEEPALIVE) no listening sockets available, shutting down'
I tried it with another port, but without success. What went wrong?
I have the same apache installation (2.0.49) on Windows 95, without problems.
creator: majo.messmer@bluewin.ch

text: *** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 14750 ***
creator: chip@force-elite.com
